meta.title: Our Credit Products | Quickfund
meta.description: Discover our credit solutions from €20 to €10,000. Micro-loan, consumer credit, business credit and more. Response within 24h.

hero.subtitle: From €20 to €10,000, find the financing that fits your situation. Guaranteed response within 24h.

microCredit.title: Micro-loan
microCredit.description: For small urgent needs. No unnecessary paperwork, no judgment. We understand that sometimes a small boost makes all the difference.
microCredit.ideal: Ideal for: tight end of month, unexpected expense, urgent small purchase

consumer.title: Consumer Credit
consumer.description: Finance your personal projects with transparency. Car, renovations, equipment... We always tell you why, accepted or declined.
consumer.ideal: Ideal for: car, renovations, appliances, travel

professional.title: Business Credit
professional.tagline: Quick cash flow for freelancers and small businesses
professional.description: We understand variable income. Freelancers, micro-businesses, artisans: no need for 3 years of accounts to be taken seriously.
professional.ideal: Ideal for: cash flow, equipment investment, development

student.title: Student Loan
student.tagline: Finance your studies without a bank guarantor
student.description: No credit history? No family guarantor? We evaluate your project and potential, not just your past.
student.ideal: Ideal for: tuition fees, housing, equipment, mobility

salaryAdvance.title: Salary Advance
salaryAdvance.tagline: Your salary, a few days earlier
salaryAdvance.description: Urgent expense before payday? Avoid costly bank overdraft. A simple solution with automatic repayment when salary arrives.
salaryAdvance.ideal: Ideal for: tight end of month, unexpected expense, urgent bill

leasing.title: Leasing
leasing.description: Vehicle, professional equipment... Leasing allows you to spread the cost without heavy investment. The asset serves as collateral, hence better rates.
leasing.ideal: Ideal for: vehicle, professional equipment, IT hardware

loanConsolidation.title: Loan Consolidation
loanConsolidation.description: Multiple loans? We consolidate them into one with often reduced monthly payment. Take back control of your budget.
loanConsolidation.ideal: Ideal for: multiple loans, high monthly payments, simplification

financialCoaching.title: Financial Coaching
financialCoaching.tagline: Control your budget, not the other way around
financialCoaching.description: Included free with every loan. Tracking dashboard, alerts, personalized advice. Premium version available for in-depth support.
financialCoaching.ideal: Ideal for: mastering your budget, avoiding defaults, better management

transparency.title: Total transparency
transparency.description: We always explain why, accepted or declined.

speed.description: No endless waiting, you know quickly.

coaching.title: Coaching included
coaching.description: We support you, we don't just lend.
